alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:27PM EDT until July 28 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fayette County in central Ohio... West central Pickaway County in central Ohio... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1227 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomingburg, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... New Holland, Deer Creek Lake, Madison Mills, Pancoastburg and State Route 207 at US Route 22. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
